TEXT.English: Year Notation
TEXT.Italian: Notazione dell'anno
TEXT.Spanish: Notación del año

TEXT.English: Whether to show "AD" (Anno Domini) before or after the game year, or to use the CE/BCE notation instead of AD/BC. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]AD Postfix[COLOR_REVERT] is what BtS originally used.
TEXT.French: Si la langue anglaise est sélectionnée, cette option permet de basculer entre deux notations anno domini différentes et la notation de "Common Era". En français, on peut choisir seulement "avant / après Jésus-Christ" ou "Ère Commune".
TEXT.German: Diese Option wechselt bei englischer Spracheinstellung zwischen zwei verschiedenen Anno-Domini-Notationen und der "Common Era"-Notation. Auf deutsch kann nur zwischen "vor/nach Christus" und "(vor) unserer Zeitrechnung" gewechselt werden.
TEXT.Italian: Se si seleziona la lingua inglese, questa opzione commuta tra due diverse notazioni di anno domini e la notazione di "Common Era". In italiano ci sono solo "avanti / dopo Cristo" ed "era volgare" per scegliere.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se selecciona el idioma inglés, esta opción cambia entre dos notaciones anno domini diferentes y la notación "Common Era". En español sólo hay "antes / después de Cristo" y "Era Común" para elegir.

TEXT.English: AD Prefix|AD Postfix|Common Era
TEXT.Spanish: a.C./d.C.|a.C./d.C.|(A)EC

TEXT.English: Enable NJAGC
TEXT.Italian: Abilita Orologio
TEXT.Spanish: Activar NJAGC

TEXT.English: Enables the NJAGC clock ("Not Just Another Game Clock"), which can be customized through the settings in the lower half of this tab. The right-hand column and the durations in the drop-down menus are only relevant if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.French: En activant, l'horloge est remplacé par le mod NJAGC de TheLopez.
TEXT.German: Aktiviert die NJAGC-Zeitanzeige ("Not Just Another Game Clock"), die sich mit den nachstehenden Optionen individuell anpassen lässt. Die rechte Spalte und die Aufklappmenüs (Anzeigedauer) sind nur dann von Bedeutung, wenn [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Abwechselnde Anzeige[COLOR_REVERT] aktiviert ist.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene utilizzato l'orologio evoluto del NJAGC (Not Just Another Game Clock) Mod di TheLopez.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, el reloj de juego se muestra empleando el mod NJAGC de TheLopez.

TEXT.English: Era Display
TEXT.Italian: Mostra l'Era
TEXT.Spanish: Mostrar Era

TEXT.English: When checked, the current era of your civilization is displayed to the left of the research bar.
TEXT.French: En activant, l'ère actualle est montrée à gauche de la barre des recherches.
TEXT.German: Zeigt das derzeitige Zeitalter Ihrer Zivilisation links neben dem Forschungsbalken an.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene mostrata l'Era corrente a sinistra della Barra di Ricerca Tecnologica.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra la era actual a la izquierda de la barra de investigación.

TEXT.English: Game Era
TEXT.Italian: Era mondiale
TEXT.Spanish: Era mundial

TEXT.English: When checked, the average era of all civilizations in the game is displayed (game era) instead of the era of your civilization. The game era is relevant for some AI behaviors, but not normally known to the human players until they've met all other civilizations, so this option could be considered cheating.
TEXT.French: When checked, the average era of all civilizations in the game is displayed (game era) instead of the era of your civilization. The game era is relevant for some AI behaviors, but not normally known to the human players until they've met all other civilizations, so this option could be considered cheating.
TEXT.German: Zeigt statt Ihrem Zeitalter das Durchschnittszeitalter aller Zivilisationen an (Spielzeitalter). Das Spielzeitalter beeinflusst das Verhalten der KI-Spieler, ist den menschlichen Spielern aber gewöhnlich erst dann bekannt, wenn sie mit allen Zivilisationen in Kontakt stehen; daher könnte man diese Option als regelwidrig ansehen.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, the average era of all civilizations in the game is displayed (game era) instead of the era of your civilization. The game era is relevant for some AI behaviors, but not normally known to the human players until they've met all other civilizations, so this option could be considered cheating.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the average era of all civilizations in the game is displayed (game era) instead of the era of your civilization. The game era is relevant for some AI behaviors, but not normally known to the human players until they've met all other civilizations, so this option could be considered cheating.

TEXT.English: Era Colors
TEXT.Italian: Usa colori dell'Era
TEXT.Spanish: Usar color de la Era

TEXT.English: When checked, the text color of the era (if enabled) and game year are displayed in the color assigned to the era. Regardless of this checkbox, the color assignments are also used by the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Show Eras[COLOR_REVERT] option ("Advisors" tab).
TEXT.French: En activant, la date et l'ère du jeu seront colorisés différemment selon l'ère actuelle.
TEXT.German: Zeigt das Zeitalter (falls aktiviert) und das Spieldatum in der Farbe an, die dem Zeitalter zugewiesen ist. Auch wenn diese Option nicht angekreuzt ist, wird das eingestellte Farbschema von der Option [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zeitalter anzeigen[COLOR_REVERT] auf dem Reiter "Berater" verwendet.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la data e l'era vengono visualizzati utilizzando colori specifici per ogni era.
TEXT.Spanish: La fecha de juego y la era se muestran con un color específico para cada era.

TEXT.English: Ancient Era
TEXT.Italian: Era Antica
TEXT.Spanish: Edad Antigüa

TEXT.English: Display color for the Ancient era
TEXT.Italian: Colore da utilizzare per l'Era Antica.
TEXT.Spanish: Color a emplear para la Edad Antigüa.

TEXT.English: Classical Era
TEXT.Italian: Era Classica
TEXT.Spanish: Edad Clásica

TEXT.English: Display color for the Classical era.
TEXT.Italian: Colore da utilizzare per l'Era Classica.
TEXT.Spanish: Color a emplear para la Edad Clásica.

TEXT.English: Medieval Era
TEXT.Italian: Era Medioevale
TEXT.Spanish: Edad Medieval

TEXT.English: Display color for the Medieval era.
TEXT.Italian: Colore da utilizzare per l'Era Medioevale.
TEXT.Spanish: Color a emplear para la Edad Medieval.

TEXT.English: Renaissance Era
TEXT.Italian: Era Rinascimentale
TEXT.Spanish: Renacimiento

TEXT.English: Display color for the Renaissance era.
TEXT.Italian: Colore da utilizzare per l'Era Rinascimentale.
TEXT.Spanish: Color a emplear para el Renacimiento.

TEXT.English: Industrial Era
TEXT.Italian: Era Industriale
TEXT.Spanish: Edad Industrial

TEXT.English: Display color for the Industrial era.
TEXT.Italian: Colore da utilizzare per l'Era Industriale.
TEXT.Spanish: Color a emplear para la Edad Industrial.

TEXT.English: Modern Era
TEXT.Italian: Era Moderna
TEXT.Spanish: Edad Contemporánea

TEXT.English: Display color for the Modern era.
TEXT.Italian: Colore da utilizzare per l'Era Moderna.
TEXT.Spanish: Color a emplear para la Edad Contemporánea.

TEXT.English: Future Era
TEXT.Italian: Era Futura
TEXT.Spanish: Edad Futura

TEXT.English: Display color for the Future era.
TEXT.Italian: Colore da utilizzare per l'Era Futura.
TEXT.Spanish: Color a emplear para la Edad Futura.

TEXT.English: Clock (Time of Day)
TEXT.Italian: Orologio
TEXT.Spanish: Reloj

TEXT.English: Clock (Time of Day)
TEXT.Italian: Orologio
TEXT.Spanish: Reloj

TEXT.English: When checked, the real time of day is displayed.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il tempo reale.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra el tiempo real.

TEXT.English: When checked, the real time of day is displayed.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il tempo reale.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el tiempo real.

TEXT.English: Game Turn
TEXT.Italian: Turni completati
TEXT.Spanish: Turnos Completados

TEXT.English: Game Turn
TEXT.Italian: Turni completati
TEXT.Spanish: Turnos Completados

TEXT.English: When checked, the current game turn number is displayed.
TEXT.French: En activant, le nombre de tours complétés est montré.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Nummer der aktuellen Runde an.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il numero di turni completati.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el número de turnos que ya se han completado.

TEXT.English: When checked, the current game turn number is displayed.
TEXT.French: En activant, le nombre de tours complétés est montré.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Nummer der aktuellen Runde an.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il numero di turni completati.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el número de turnos completados.

TEXT.English: Turn Limit
TEXT.Italian: Turni Totali
TEXT.Spanish: Turnos Totales

TEXT.English: Turn Limit
TEXT.Italian: Turni Totali
TEXT.Spanish: Turnos Totales

TEXT.English: When checked, the turn limit is displayed if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Time Victory[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.French: En activant, le nombre total de tours pour une Victoire de Temps est montré.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die maximale Rundenzahl des Spiels an, falls die Siegbedingung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Punktsieg[COLOR_REVERT] aktiviert ist.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il numero di turni totali (se la Vittoria a Tempo è abilitata).
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el número de turnos totales si la condición de Victoria por Tiempo está habilitada.

TEXT.English: When checked, the turn limit is displayed if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Time Victory[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.French: En activant, le nombre total de tours pour une Victoire de Temps est montré.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die maximale Rundenzahl des Spiels an, falls die Siegbedingung [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Punktsieg[COLOR_REVERT] aktiviert ist.
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzato il numero di turni totali (se la Vittoria a Tempo è abilitata).
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el número de turnos totales si la condición de Victoria por Tiempo está habilitada.

TEXT.English: Game Year and Golden Age
TEXT.French: Date du Jeu et Tours d'Age d'Or
TEXT.Italian: Data del gioco e turni rimasti dell'Età dell'Oro
TEXT.Spanish: Fecha de Juego y Edad de Oro

TEXT.English: Game Year and Golden Age
TEXT.French: Date du Jeu et Tours d'Age d'Or
TEXT.Italian: Data del gioco e turni rimasti dell'Età dell'Oro
TEXT.Spanish: Fecha de Juego y Edad de Oro

TEXT.English: When checked, the game date and the number of turns left in a Golden Age are displayed. (Both as in BtS.)
TEXT.French: En activant, la date du jeu et les tours restant de vos Ages d'Or sont montrés.
TEXT.German: Zeigt das Spieldatum und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden im Goldenen Zeitalter an. (Beides wie in BtS.)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzata la data in gioco e il numero di turni di Età dell'Oro rimasti.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la fecha de juego y el número de turnos restantes de la Edad de Oro.

TEXT.English: When checked, the game date and the number of turns left in a Golden Age are displayed. (Both as in BtS.)
TEXT.French: En activant, la date du jeu et les tours restant de vos Ages d'Or sont montrés.
TEXT.German: Zeigt das Spieldatum und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden im Goldenen Zeitalter an. (Beides wie in BtS.)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, viene visualizzata la data in gioco e il numero di turni di Età dell'Oro rimasti.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la fecha de juego y el número de turnos restantes de la Edad de Oro.

TEXT.English: Alternate View
TEXT.Italian: Visualizzazione alternativa
TEXT.Spanish: Vista Alternativa

TEXT.English: When checked, NJAGC alternates between the settings in the left column and those on the right. The two dropdown menus determine for how many seconds each view is shown.
TEXT.French: When checked, NJAGC alternates between the settings in the left column and those on the right. The two dropdown menus determine for how many seconds each view is shown.
TEXT.German: Lässt die Zeitanzeige zwischen den Einstellungen in der linken Spalte und jenen in der rechten Spalte wechseln. Die beiden Aufklappmenüs steuern die jeweilige Anzeigedauer.
TEXT.Italian: When checked, NJAGC alternates between the settings in the left column and those on the right. The two dropdown menus determine for how many seconds each view is shown.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, NJAGC alternates between the settings in the left column and those on the right. The two dropdown menus determine for how many seconds each view is shown.

TEXT.English: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the right are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.French: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the right are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.German: Die Anzeigedauer (Sekunden) für die Einstellungen in der rechten Spalte, falls [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Abwechselnde Anzeige[COLOR_REVERT] aktiviert ist.
TEXT.Italian: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the right are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.Spanish: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the right are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.

TEXT.English: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the left are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.French: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the left are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.German: Die Anzeigedauer (Sekunden) für die Einstellungen in der linken Spalte, falls [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Abwechselnde Anzeige[COLOR_REVERT] aktiviert ist.
TEXT.Italian: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the left are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
TEXT.Spanish: The duration in seconds for which the settings on the left are used if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Alternate View[COLOR_REVERT] is enabled.
